title: Construction of the building for the proposed Help Zone of the University of Colombo
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of City Planning, Water Supply and Higher Education to award the contract for the construction of the building for the proposed Help Zone of the University of Colombo, to M/s Kandy Construction at No.264/2, Koswatta, Battaramulla, for a sum of Rs.520 million, was approved by the Cabinet.
